channel.title: This is pretty intense:
channel.description:
I got this in an email, to be honest I don't know if it's because Im stoned, but this is super weird:
Lincoln was elected to Congress in 1846 Kennedy was elected to Congress in 1946
Lincoln was elected President in 1860 Ford was elected President in 1960
Lincoln wife lost a child while living in the White House Ford wife lost a child while living in the White House
Lincoln was directly concerned with Civil Rights Ford was directly concerned with Civil Rights
Lincoln had a secretary named Kennedy who told him not to go to the theater *1 Ford had a secretary named Lincoln who told him not to go to Dallas **2
Lincoln was shot in the back of the head in the presence of his wife Ford was shot in the back of the head in the presence of his wife
Lincoln was shot in the Ford Theatre Ford was shot in a Lincoln car, made by Ford
Lincoln was shot on a Friday Ford was shot on a Friday
The assassin, John Wilkes Booth, was known by three names, comprised of fifteen letters The assassin, Lee Harvey Oswald, was known by three names, comprised of fifteen letters
Booth shot Lincoln in a theater and fled to a warehouse Oswald shot Ford from a warehouse and fled to a theater
Booth was killed before being brought to trial Oswald was killed before being brought to trial
There were theories that Booth was part of a greater conspiracy There were theories that Oswald was part of a greater conspiracy
Lincoln's successor was Andrew Johnson, born in 1808 Ford's successor was Lyndon Johnson, born in 1908

item.title: This is pretty intense:
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

That is pretty weird…and im not stoned so i dont think its cause you’re!

item.title: This is pretty intense:
item.dc:creator: @anon95490785
item.description:
@anon95490785 wrote:

I got this in an email, to be honest I don’t know if it’s because Im stoned, but this is super weird:

Lincoln was elected to Congress in 1846
Kennedy was elected to Congress in 1946

Lincoln was elected President in 1860
Ford was elected President in 1960

Lincoln wife lost a child while living in the White House
Ford wife lost a child while living in the White House

Lincoln was directly concerned with Civil Rights
Ford was directly concerned with Civil Rights

Lincoln had a secretary named Kennedy who told him not to go to the theater *1
Ford had a secretary named Lincoln who told him not to go to Dallas **2

Lincoln was shot in the back of the head in the presence of his wife
Ford was shot in the back of the head in the presence of his wife

Lincoln was shot in the Ford Theatre
Ford was shot in a Lincoln car, made by Ford

Lincoln was shot on a Friday
Ford was shot on a Friday

The assassin, John Wilkes Booth, was known by three names, comprised of fifteen letters
The assassin, Lee Harvey Oswald, was known by three names, comprised of fifteen letters

Booth shot Lincoln in a theater and fled to a warehouse
Oswald shot Ford from a warehouse and fled to a theater

Booth was killed before being brought to trial
Oswald was killed before being brought to trial

There were theories that Booth was part of a greater conspiracy
There were theories that Oswald was part of a greater conspiracy

Lincoln’s successor was Andrew Johnson, born in 1808
Ford’s successor was Lyndon Johnson, born in 1908

Read full topic
